message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with a deep neural network architecture that links visual regions to corresponding textual segments, making use of semantic information available in a joint embedding space of multi-modal data. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including computer vision (cs.CV), natural language processing (cs.CL), multimedia (cs.MM), information retrieval (cs.IR), and machine learning (cs.LG). However, given that the paper focuses on image captioning and phrase localization, it is most likely to belong to the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category.
